description.raw: The nonlinear-evaluation is replaced with an Evaluator system that allows the attachment of handlers with associated operator trees/tasks.  Handlers are used to compute the RHS terms, as well as analysis terms in a coordinated fashion.  The analysis handlers use parallel-hdf5 to jointly write to single files.  Finally field.constant metadata has been added to track when a field is really defined over the subspace of the domain, and correspondingly just the relevant data is saved.  Integration and interpolation basis methods and operators are implemented.
description.html: The nonlinear-evaluation is replaced with an Evaluator system that allows the attachment of handlers with associated operator trees/tasks. Handlers are used to compute the RHS terms, as well as analysis terms in a coordinated fashion. The analysis handlers use parallel-hdf5 to jointly write to single files. Finally field.constant metadata has been added to track when a field is really defined over the subspace of the domain, and correspondingly just the relevant data is saved. Integration and interpolation basis methods and operators are implemented.

title: Analysis + Joint Evaluator
